body.p: The proposed classification ‘held for sale’ and resulting measurement of non‑current assets (or disposal groups) so classified is based on a management decision that has not yet been fully carried out and demands detailed (anti‑abuse) rules to define the classification and to fix the time boundaries during which these assets can remain within the classification. The final result is, in Mr Schmid’s view, an excessively detailed and rule‑based Standard.
